sentences.en: A beluga whale at Vancouver's aquarium.
sentences.cn: 温哥华水族馆里的一条白鲸.

sentences.en: A beluga whale swims in a tank at the Vancouver Aquarium.
sentences.cn: 一头白色大鳇鱼或叫大白鲸在北美洲的范库弗峰水族馆里游弋着.

sentences.en: It's beluga, the best caviar in the world.
sentences.cn: 这是白海豚, 全世界最好的鱼子酱.

sentences.en: Photo Gallery: Whales The beluga, or white whale, is one of the smallest species of whale.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼图片 美术馆 .白色大寻鱼白鲸, 或白鲸, 是鲸鱼的最小的物种之一.

sentences.en: Sushi may not be traditional Christmas fare, but this Beluga seems keen.
sentences.cn: 寿司可能并不是圣诞节的传统食物, 但是这头白鲸却表现出对寿司的浓厚兴趣.

sentences.en: These remarkable pictures show how beluga whales help human visitors to swim under the thick ice.
sentences.cn: 以下这些不平常的图片展示了白鲸帮助人类访客在厚冰层下游泳的情景.

trans.tran_en: a large white sturgeon, Acipenser (or Huso) huso, of the Black and Caspian Seas: a source of caviar and isinglass
